trans-unit.source: Provides change monitoring for SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: Fornece monitorização de alterações para bases de dados do SQL Server.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The SqlChangeMonitor class wraps the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class and adds change monitoring for SQL Server-based dependencies.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SqlChangeMonitor encapsula num wrapper a ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>classe e adiciona a monitorização de alterações para dependências baseado em SQL Server.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the SqlChangeMonitor class serves as a bridge between the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object and the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, a classe de SqlChangeMonitor funciona como uma ponte entre o ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>objeto e o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching>espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The SqlChangeMonitor method binds the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event of the object in `dependency` to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> method handler.
trans-unit.target: O método SqlChangeMonitor vincula o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>evento do objeto na `dependency` para o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A>processador de método.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: This enables the change monitor to receive notification of changes in SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que o monitor de alteração receber a notificação de alterações nas bases de dados do SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the SqlChangeMonitor constructor, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando invocar o construtor de SqlChangeMonitor, tem de transmitir um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>objeto como parâmetro.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> parameter to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>objeto, tem de transmitir um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>parâmetro para o construtor.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: The constructor for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class lets you specify optional information for configuring the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>classe permite-lhe especificar informações opcionais para configurar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>instância.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents an ADO.NET <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objecto que representa um ADO.NET <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um identificador para um <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class generates a GUID for this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor>classe gera um GUID para esta propriedade.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor>

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the change monitor.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador para o monitor de alteração.
